name: Shimano XC5 Cycling Shoes - Unisex
description: Shoes for riders who like mud as much as pavement. Their robust and perforated upper sheds mud but lets the heat out too. The carbon midsole provides great stiffness and vibration dampening, so say goodbye to numb or burning toes. Whether you ride on or off-road, these ultra-gripped shoes will let you walk like a human...not a duck.Synthetic leather upper sheds mud and snow while perforations let heat escape.Carbon fibre reinforced midsole absorbs vibration and provides stiff pedalling platform.Boa® L6 Fit System with micro-adjustments.Michelin tread gives a high traction sole that sheds mud.Spike mounts (18mm option) add grip for tough or icy conditions.Compatible with 2-bolt cleats.
